title: Sound On: Subway Shooter in Custody
itunes:title: Sound On: Subway Shooter in Custody
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: David Schwartz, former Brooklyn prosecutor and Partner at Gerstman Schwartz, June Grasso Host of Bloomberg Law, Bloomberg politics contributor Rick Davis, and former New York Congressman Joe Crowley.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
